/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/


import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.util.Date;


public class Tracer
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Tracer Attributes
  private String x;
  private int y;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public Tracer(String aX, int aY)
  {
    x = aX;
    y = aY;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public boolean setX(String aX)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    x = aX;
    wasSet = true;
    fileTracer(x);
    return wasSet;
  }

  public boolean setY(int aY)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    y = aY;
    wasSet = true;
    fileTracer(y);
    return wasSet;
  }

  public String getX()
  {
    return x;
  }

  public int getY()
  {
    return y;
  }

  public void delete()
  {}

  //------------------------
  // FILE TRACER METHOD
  //------------------------

  static void fileTracer(Object obj)
  {
    FileOutputStream fout = null;
    Date date = new Date();
    try
    {
      // Open an output stream
      fout = new FileOutputStream ("TraceLog.txt",true);
      new PrintStream(fout).println ("(Tracing log file)");
    }
    catch (IOException e)
    {
      System.err.println ("Unable to write to file");
      System.exit(-1);
    }
    new PrintStream(fout).println("Traced object value: " + obj);
    new PrintStream(fout).println("Trace time : " + date);
  }

}
